basic_info.description: I'm Kyle Cordell, a software engineer with a background in network engineering and a passion for building innovative and intuitive applications. As an Air Force veteran, I developed a strong work ethic and attention to detail that have been invaluable in my software engineering career. I have built award-winning applications and further honed my full-stack development skills at a rigorous software engineering boot camp. In my role as a software engineer in the freight industry, I delivered scalable and responsive applications using technologies including Node.js, Typescript, and React. I am excited to leverage my experience and expertise to take on new challenges and build cutting-edge applications.

projects.title: Tip Calculator
projects.description: This web application was developed to simplify the process of tipping, making it easy to tip appropriately based on the quality of service received. It also allows you to round your total and keep track of past transactions.

experience.title: Software Engineer (Full-stack)
bullets: Developed Node.js, Typescript, and React-based fleet maintenance software, leveraging GPS data to streamline scheduling and enhance trailer inspections, reducing time waste by >300%, resulting in significant cost savings through improved efficiency

Designed and developed a software update optimizing GraphQL API performance by implementing pagination and addressing an n+1 issue utilizing a data loader, achieving >10x improvement in response time while adding process-improving features
Increased data accuracy and reliability by validating and migrating legacy excel data into production Postgres tables, delivering >3x time savings for operations teams

Optimized trailer GPS data processing through implementing Kafka event subscribers to ingest GPS sensor data into a new service, improving data analysis and paving the way for future feature implementation
Coordinated user testing, bug resolution, and additional feature requests resulting in a successful, well-received product launch
Ensured critical business operations through 24/7 on-call system debugging and swift resolution of customer requests, maintaining system availability and high customer satisfaction
Refined AGILE sprint processes as team scrum master, resulting in efficient team productivity and collaboration across multiple business disciplines

experience.title: Network Provisioning Engineer
bullets: Spearheaded engineering of award-winning applications, doubling service delivery speed & standardizing business processes
Orchestrated a high-impact, multi-state network upgrade, boosting bandwidth >200%, delivering enhanced capacity & reliability
Programmed network device configurations for new data services, contributing to surpassing annual revenue goal of $1B

experience.title: Senior Airman
bullets: Modernized radar system through fleet-wide software and component upgrades, improving performance and prolonging lifespan
Utilized troubleshooting skills to maximize reliability and performance of aircraft radar systems in support of critical missions
